input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch Full Alamosa Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 5' x 28" Mixed Green Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM 7 FT Artificial Christmas Tree Unlit Douglas Fir with Realistic Branches and 1346 Tips'
  - Name='7 ft. Pink Hinged Slim Unlit Artificial Xmas Christmas Tree with Metal Stand'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Unlit Blue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Grand Canyon Cedar Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Frosted Fraser Fir Most Realistic,Frosted White Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman Durham Pole Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7 Ft Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch Full Alamosa Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a full artificial fir tree with realistic feel similar to the Dunhill Fir; likely similar construction and usage, though specific features like hinged branches or light pre-strung status are not mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 5' x 28" Mixed Green Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a mixed pine tree rather than a fir, smaller size and medium fullness indicated, so less similar in species and possibly fullness to the Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM 7 FT Artificial Christmas Tree Unlit Douglas Fir with Realistic Branches and 1346 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an unlit Douglas Fir, similar full artificial fir tree with a high number of tips, close in size and detailed realistic branches; very similar except this one is unlit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7 ft. Pink Hinged Slim Unlit Artificial Xmas Christmas Tree with Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though it has hinged branches and metal stand like the Dunhill Fir, it is a slim pink tree which differs significantly in silhouette and intended aesthetic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Unlit Blue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An unlit artificial blue spruce, differing species and likely look, with no mention of hinged branches or other shared features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Grand Canyon Cedar Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cedar tree from a premium brand, likely full and well constructed, but different tree species and no specific mention of hinged branches or pre-strung lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Frosted Fraser Fir Most Realistic,Frosted White Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a fir tree with high realism and full body, similar in species and construction approach, but frosted white finish changes traditional look; likely close in quality and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman Durham Pole Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pole pine style differs significantly in silhouette and branch fullness from a full bodied fir like the Dunhill.
Generic unlit artificial tree, no species or construction details but similar in height; relevance is moderate due to lack of specifics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is the same Dunhill Fir model by National Tree but in a slim version, hence almost identical in brand, construction and style but with slimmer silhouette.
